liir.sre.nfa

Class NFA

  • java.lang.Object
    • liir.sre.nfa.NFA

  • public class NFA
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by quynhdo on 04/11/16. This class is used to convert a string to a corresponding NFA using Thompson's construction theory: ref: https://swtch.com/~rsc/regexp/regexp1.html To check if a string matches a regular expression, we simulate the corresponding NFA when scanning the given string. If the NFA enter a FINAL state then the string and the expression match.
